languages.text: Орудия крейсера выслеживали цель за целью, и никакая броня не могла защитить от их снарядов. Пропахав гусеницами оборону врага, левиафан истребил презренных Несущих Слово и принес нам великий триумф.

traits.locale_text: Гаргантюозный крейсер одним выстрелом за другим превращал километры земли в выжженую пустошь, испаряя полки врага один за другим. Его гусеницы перемалывали под собой целые здания вместе с засевшими в них еретиками и демоническими машинами. Поле боя было нашим.

languages.text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.
languages.original_text: Орудия крейсера выслеживали цель за целью, и никакая броня не могла защитить от их снарядов. Пропахав гусеницами оборону врага, левиафан истребил презренных Несущих Слово и принес нам великий триумф.

traits.locale_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

languages.text: 巡洋舰的武器完美地击中了敌人，无论敌人的装甲多厚，都不可能在这样的攻击中存活下来。利维坦的巨型履带辗过了敌人的防线，彻底消灭了那群邪恶的怀言者，为我们带来了辉煌的胜利。
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

traits.locale_text: 巡洋舰的武器完美地击中了敌人，无论敌人的装甲多厚，都不可能在这样的攻击中存活下来。利维坦的巨型履带辗过了敌人的防线，彻底消灭了那群邪恶的怀言者，为我们带来了辉煌的胜利。

languages.text: Grâce à leur système de visée précis, les armes du croiseur n'ont eu aucun mal à abattre leurs cibles, qui ne pouvaient plus compter sur leurs armures pour les protéger de tels tirs. Les chenilles du mastodonte ont écrasé les défenses ennemies et nous ont fait notre triomphe en décimant les rangs de ces Word Bearers abjects.
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à leur système de visée précis, les armes du croiseur n'ont eu aucun mal à abattre leurs cibles, qui ne pouvaient plus compter sur leurs armures pour les protéger de tels tirs. Les chenilles du mastodonte ont écrasé les défenses ennemies et nous ont fait notre triomphe en décimant les rangs de ces Word Bearers abjects.

languages.text: 巡洋艦の兵器は標的をしっかりと追尾し、どんな装甲もあのような射撃から彼らを守ることはできなかった。巨大艦隊のトレッドは敵の防御網の上を転がり、卑劣なワードベアラーどもを壊滅させ、我々に大きな勝利をもたらした。
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

traits.locale_text: 巡洋艦の兵器は標的をしっかりと追尾し、どんな装甲もあのような射撃から彼らを守ることはできなかった。巨大艦隊のトレッドは敵の防御網の上を転がり、卑劣なワードベアラーどもを壊滅させ、我々に大きな勝利をもたらした。

languages.text: Las armas del crucero rastrearon con certeza a sus objetivos y no hay cantidad de armadura que proteja contra disparos de ese calibre. Las orugas del leviatán arrollaron las defensas enemigas, aplastando a los deleznables Portadores de la Palabra y trayéndonos un gran triunfo.
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Las armas del crucero rastrearon con certeza a sus objetivos y no hay cantidad de armadura que proteja contra disparos de ese calibre. Las orugas del leviatán arrollaron las defensas enemigas, aplastando a los deleznables Portadores de la Palabra y trayéndonos un gran triunfo.

languages.text: Die Waffen des Kreuzers haben ihre Ziele gut verfolgt, und keine Panzerung konnte sie vor solchen Schüssen beschützen. Die Ketten des Leviathans überrollten die Verteidigung des Feindes, dezimierten die verhassten Word Bearers und brachten uns großen Triumph.
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Die Waffen des Kreuzers haben ihre Ziele gut verfolgt, und keine Panzerung könnte sie vor solchen Schüssen beschützen. Die Ketten des Leviathans überrollten die Verteidigung des Feindes, dezimierten die verhassten Word Bearers und brachten uns großen Triumph.

languages.text: Geminin silahları, hedefinin izini sürme konusunda oldukça başarılıydı ve hiçbir zırh da bu atışlara dayanamazdı. Devin dişli tekerlekleri; düşman savunmasını ezmekle kalmadı, aşağılık Vahyedenler'i kırana geçirdi. Bu sayede zafere ulaştık.
languages.original_text: The cruiser's weapons tracked their targets well, and no armour could protect them from shots like that. The leviathan's treads rolled over the enemy defences, decimating the contemptible Word Bearers and bringing us great triumph.
